description: Detects the exploitation of Microsoft Exchange vulnerability as described in CVE-2020-0688 Author: Florian Roth, wagga. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: CVE-2020-0688 Exploitation via Eventlog
query: (winlog.channel:"Application" AND (winlog.event_id:"4" AND Provider_Name:"MSExchange\ Control\ Panel" AND Level:"Error") AND "&__VIEWSTATE\=")
